title: 3DTILES_tile_metadata extension
description: 3D Tiles extension that enables storage of per-tile metadata.

arrayLengths.description: The number of elements in each of the property arrays. Equal to the number of tiles in this tileset JSON.

propertyArrays.description: An array of property arrays containing tile data. Elements in `propertyArrays` have a one-to-one correspondence to elements in `properties`.
